borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of all external materials (including samples) to be used in the development including walls, windows, balustrades, cladding and roofing materials pursuant to condition 3; cycle storage pursuant to condition 4; Construction Logistics Plan pursuant to condition 7; enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings pursuant to condition 9; sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial parts of the premises from dwellings pursuant to condition 10; Sustainable Urban Drainage System pursuant to condition 20; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 22; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 23; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 24; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 25; verification report pursuant to condition 26; onward long-term monitoring methodology report pursuant to condition 27 of planning permission ref: 2024/02443/FUL granted 4th June 2025.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
